channel.title: MIL:MFEB on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in MIL:MFEB on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Berlusconi’s MFE Wins Control of German Broadcaster in Europe Push
item.description: MFE-MediaForEurope NV, the broadcaster founded by the late Silvio Berlusconi, will control around 60% of ProSiebenSat.1 Media SE after the German company’s second-largest shareholder agreed to sell it

item.title: Berlusconi’s MFE Wins Control of German Broadcaster in Europe Push
item.description: MFE-MediaForEurope NV, the broadcaster founded by the late Silvio Berlusconi, will control around 60% of ProSiebenSat.1 Media SE after the German company’s second-largest shareholder agreed to sell it
